snippet: Many previous cease-fire agreements have failed, but the dynamics have changed since pro-government forces fully retook Aleppo....

byline.original: By BEN HUBBARD and NEIL MacFARQUHAR
byline.contributor: Ben Hubbard reported from Beirut, and Neil MacFarquhar from Moscow. Reporting was contributed by Hwaida Saad from Beirut, Maher Samaan from Paris, Eric Schmitt from Washington, and Karam Shoumali from Istanbul.

lead_paragraph: Many previous cease-fire agreements have failed, but the dynamics have changed since pro-government forces fully retook Aleppo.

headline.main: New Cease-Fire Begins in Syria, but Violations Are Reported Within Hours
headline.print_headline: New Cease-Fire Begins in Syria, but Violations Are Reported Within Hours
